c74object.name: stemversion
c74object.digest: Generates a version symbol based on the current timestamp
c74object.description: The `stemversion` object outputs a symbol representing the current date and time upon receiving a bang. The format is `[year-month-day-hour-minute-second]`.

inlet.description: Sends a bang to trigger the output of the current system time as a symbol.

outlet.description: Outputs diagnostic information when the verbose attribute is enabled.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When enabled (1), the object provides additional diagnostic information.

method.name: bang
method.description: Triggers the formatting and output of the current date and time.
